org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes

Class MenuScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes.Scene
      • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes.MenuScene

  • public abstract class MenuScene
extends Scene
    Abstract MenuScene instantiated from the Scene class. Containing a list of menu items and a title. The title can be specified with it's own font.
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<MenuItem> menuItems 
      protected java.lang.String titleFont 
      protected float y 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addButton(java.lang.String text, Action action, java.lang.String fontKey)
      Places a button in the menuItem list, and automatically calculates the next y-coordinate based on the height of this element and the previous y-coordinate.
      void addLabel(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String fontKey)
      Places a non-clickable label in the menuItem list, and automatically calculates the next y-coordinate based on the height of this element and the previous y-coordinate.
      void render()
      Renders the Title and all the menu items.
      void setup() 
      void show()
      Resets the Y coordinate.
